name: Skeleton Warrior
pages: Skeleton Warriors are long dead warriors reanimated by dark magics. They are similar to Skeletons except they use melee weapons. They will always spawn with a weapon in hand and may have armor.

$(l)Number$(): 1-2$(br)$(l)Size$(): Medium$(br)$(l)Level$(): Mob$(br)$(l)Rarity$(): Common$(br)$(l)Movement$(): Walks$(br)$(l)Speed$(): Normal$(br)$(l)Health$(): 20hp$(br)$(l)Damage/Strength$(): 2hp$(br)$(l)Daylight$(): No$(br)$(l)Despawn$(): Yes$(br)$(l)Spawns$(): Overworld, Underworld
$(l)Weapons/Specials$():$(br)- Equipped with melee weapons and armor.
